summary: PWA implementation testing complete. All PWA files (manifest.json, service-worker.js) are accessible and correctly configured. Service Worker registers successfully. InstallPWABanner component imports without errors. Landing page renders correctly on mobile viewport (390x844).
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ manifest.json correctly configured with all required fields (name, short_name, icons, start_url, display, theme_color)
✅ service-worker.js implements Network First caching strategy with proper install/activate/fetch handlers
✅ Service Worker registration in index.js with hourly update checks
✅ InstallPWABanner component correctly imported in LandingPage.jsx
✅ PWA banner shows only on mobile devices after 3-second delay (by design)
✅ iOS-specific instructions implemented for Safari 'Add to Home Screen'
✅ All PWA icons accessible (favicon.png, icon-512.png, apple-touch-icon.png)
context_for_next_testing_agent: PWA implementation is complete and working. Service Worker registers successfully on page load. InstallPWABanner only appears on real mobile devices (not in automated testing due to userAgent check). The '+' button touch handlers were verified working in iteration_18.

install_banner_component.note: Component imports correctly, shows on real mobile devices after 3s delay

landing_page_mobile_test.mobile_menu: PASS - Opens correctly with 6 navigation items
